position - Variable in class ss.pentago.tui.OfflineTextInputHandler
Since the move is split in position and rotation, this value keeps track of whether the position has been set (-1 when it hasn't been set), so the full move can be sent after the rotation has been specified.

ProtocolHandler - Interface in ss.pentago.network.protocol
